title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the explanation

1 point is earned for the right Riemann sum

1 point is earned for the approximation

∫ 40 0 | v ( t ) | d t MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaaCbmaeaaqa aaaaaaaaWdbiabgUIiYdWcpaqaa8qacaaI0aGaaGimaaWdaeaapeGa aGimaaaak8aadaabdaqaa8qacaWG2bWdamaabmaabaWdbiaadshaa8 aacaGLOaGaayzkaaaacaGLhWUaayjcSdWdbiaadsgacaWG0baaaa@4392@ is the total distance Johanna jogs, in meters, over the time interval 0 ≤ t ≤ 40 minutes.

∫ 40 0 | v ( t ) | d t MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaaCbmaeaaqa aaaaaaaaWdbiabgUIiYdWcpaqaa8qacaaI0aGaaGimaaWdaeaapeGa aGimaaaak8aadaabdaqaa8qacaWG2bWdamaabmaabaWdbiaadshaa8 aacaGLOaGaayzkaaaacaGLhWUaayjcSdWdbiaadsgacaWG0baaaa@4392@ ≈ 12 ⋅ |v(12)| + 8 ⋅ |v(20)| + 4 ⋅ |v(24)| + 16 ⋅ |v(40)|

= 12 ⋅ 200 + 8 ⋅ 240 + 4 ⋅ 220 + 16 ⋅ 150

= 2400 + 1920 + 880 + 2400

= 7600 meters
